description:
Designed for the students with absolutely no programming experience, these sessions will explain not only how to program in Python, but will also explain what programming is, as well as why even non-professionals like to program in the first place.

This 8-hour train will allow new learners to jump start a programming career by reviewing the main reasons scientists, electrical engineers, and systems administrators love to use Python. Learn how to apply fundamental Python keywords so as to collect, enumerate, format, and create reports for the most-used collection types.

Students will complete keyword mastery by exploring a large collection activity-related topics. Learn how to create Generators, as well as Context Managers. Discover how to both use as well as extend Python's exception framework.

Discover how to simultaneously print to the screen, as well as to a file. Practice creating data files that can be opened with Libre Office, Open Office, as well as Microsoft Excel. Learn the secret of Google's success by discovering how to index popular data formats, as well as binary files.

Gain hands-on experience locating, running, writing and reading information from cooperating with external programs. Discover how to write programs that can you can use start and / or automate programs. Learn how to both send and receive information to external programs using cross-platform standard input, as well as output streams. Learn how to interface with the Python interpreter to run dynamically-created commands, as well as stand-alone scripts.

Gain hands-on experience locating, running, writing and reading information from cooperating with external programs. Discover how to write programs that can you can use start and / or automate programs. Learn how to both send and receive information to external programs using cross-platform standard input, as well as output streams. Learn how to interface with the Python interpreter to run dynamically-created commands, as well as stand-alone scripts.
title: Practical Python for Beginners
